title: collecting_bedding_at_sunset_dew_onset
summary: Collecting bed sheet after 17:00 as sunset approaches and dew begins to form.
description: Image documents the collection of a bed sheet that was previously hung for drying. The activity occurred after 17:00, near sunset, when atmospheric conditions indicate the onset of dew. This reflects routine adjustment of household tasks based on environmental timing.

linked_references.note: Referenced to original bedding drying time.

context_notes: Household activity adjusted to environmental conditions

external_reference.note: Image used to verify timing and environmental condition.
